description: This file defines API endpoints related to assessments in a FastAPI application. It sets up routes for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting assessments, utilizing dependency injection for the AssessmentsService.

methods.name: get_assessments_service
methods.description: Provides a dependency-injected instance of AssessmentsService.

methods.name: list_assessments
methods.description: API endpoint to list all assessments.

methods.name: get_assessment
methods.description: API endpoint to retrieve a specific assessment by ID.

methods.name: create_assessment
methods.description: API endpoint to create a new assessment.

methods.name: update_assessment
methods.description: API endpoint to update an existing assessment.

methods.name: delete_assessment
methods.description: API endpoint to delete an assessment.
